title: Citation
exclude-listing: true
---

```{r}
#| results: asis
#| echo: false
pkg <- pkgdown:::as_pkgdown("../.")
cat(paste(pkgdown:::repo_source(pkg, "DESCRIPTION"), "\n\n"))
citations <- pkgdown:::data_citations(pkg)
cat(paste(citations$html, "\n\n"))
cat(paste("```bibtex", "\n"))
cat(paste(citations$bibtex, "\n"))
cat("```\n\n")
```
